summary: Light retexture for the Val Tirkai armor from Tera Armor for Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/394727ScreenShot5.png[/img][/Center]

[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/958598requiredmod.png[/img][/Center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846/?][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/970959modrequis.png[/img][/url][/Center]


[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/566382manualinsallation.png[/img][/Center]
 Extract the content of the .rar file to your Data folder found in your Skyrim main folder. It probably looks like this :
[quote] {Your drive letter}:\\Program Files\\Skyrim\'s Folder\\Data\\
or
{Your drive letter}:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\Common\\Skyrim\'s Folder\\Data\\
[/quote]

Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26679//?]Tera Val Tirkai - UNPB BBP[/url]

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2113195/?]asianboy345[/url] for his great Tera Armor mod.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5483731/?]Iromizu[/url] for his TERA Weapons Collection for Skyrim.

[img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/623876optionaltextures.png[/img]

[img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/249300optionalretexture.png[/img][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/933165compare.png[/img]

[img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/642466reprisalsword.png[/img]
You need [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27463/?]TERA Weapons Collection for Skyrim by Iromizu[/url] if you want to use the Reprisal Sword retexture. Install this mods first and then my retexture.


[center][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/402675recommandedmods.png[/img][/Center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26679//?]Tera Val Tirkai - UNPB BBP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?] DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900//?] UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35094/?]Aesir Armor by Omesean[/url][/Center]
author: JohnAzerty

files.name: JA - Val Tirkai Armor Retexture for UNP
